Description:
Delightful, modern and spacious.
Sophisticated presentation and spacious design provides a wonderful family lifestyle at this three bedroom property. Currently occupied to wonderful long term tenants at $350pw this charming brick veneer home is sure to appeal to investors searching for a neat property in a quiet court location. Upon Entrance you will be struck by the warm inviting style and floor plan designed to please with a flood of natural light that enhance the home's welcoming warmth. Enjoy a generous sense of space inside and outside. This property is modern and stylish throughout with open living areas, a well equipped kitchen with stainless steel oven and a servery-style outlook of the main living area. A formal lounge off the front entry flows into the dining room before opening into the casual living zone, where there is access to the secure and private large yard. An impressive alfresco provides a terrific entertaining atmosphere with full shelter from the elements and lots of space for the bbq and outdoor furniture. The surrounds are well maintained and feature covered parking for up to three cars. This beautiful home sits on a big size block of 593m2 (approx.) in a priceless location, just a moments' drive away from the Corio Shopping Centre, multiple schools for all ages, reserves and the Geelong Ring Road. This is a great opportunity to buy a lovely family home with everything you need close by.
PLEASE NOTE: The photos advertised are from the previous sale of the property in 2016. Please be sure to book and inspection to view the home in the current condition.
Insights: 2 Dunraven Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Golden Opportunities Don't Come Around Too Often
Golden opportunities like this don't come around too often. With Corio and Norlane being the up and coming area for development opportunities, you can't go past this little beauty. Set on a corner block this property is just perfect for the investor, developer or first home buyer. Yes, the house needs much love and is crying out for a makeover but what is on offer hear is an authentic fixer upper.
Comprising 3 bedrooms, lounge with gas heating, kitchen dining and central bathroom. The opportunities with this property are endless, Brilliantly Located in a growth corridor within close proximity to Corio Shopping Centre and only 200m from the soon to be completed $33 million Barwon Health's Medical Hub. With easy access to public transport and Princess Highway for Melbourne commuters the location doesn't get any better than this. This is a home that the true handyman, builder or developer with foresight will appreciate and is an opportunity just waiting to be snapped up.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
"Add Me To Your Investment Portfolio"
Situated in a walking distance to major Corio Shopping Center, Schools and public transport. A fantastic opportunity has presented itself for investors/developers looking to add to their portfolio. This home features 3 good sized bedrooms plus an extra large lock up garage on 600m2 (approx) with wide driveway access to the rear yard providing subdivision potential (STCA). Close to schools, shops, public transport plus easy access to the Ring Road for Melbourne/Surf Coast commuters and Princes Hwy for Geelong CBD.
-Large 600sqm Allotment (Approx.)
-Potential to Subdivide (STCA)
-Close to schools, shops & public transport
-Currently tenanted $255 per week.
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Brilliant first home with a spacious floor plan.
Welcome to a very conveniently positioned home which will appeal to large families, first home buyers, investors and those looking to stop renting and settle into a place of their own, this property has something for all. Spotlessly presented & immaculate throughout this residence offers a roomy lounge boasting wood fire, S/S A/C and floorboards ideal for year round comfort. Four bedrooms in total, all with BIRs, are positioned off the main hall in close proximity to the central bathroom, while the master bedroom contains an open ensuite. Towards the rear of the dwelling lies an extensive rumpus room which offers multiple uses depending on the new owner's needs. The spotless kitchen complete with dishwasher, island bench and large pantry overlooks the modest meals area that opens onto the decked undercover alfresco perfect for seamless inside/outside entertaining. Ample room in the rear yard remains for the family to enjoy which includes a playground and large tandem lock up garage. Located just around the corner from the Goldsworthy Reserve and a 10 minute walk to the Corio Shopping Centre means all major amenities are within easy reach of the home. If you're looking for a well-kept home in a great area be sure to put this property on the top of your shopping list.
Insights: 5 Wyoming Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
A Heart Warming Family Home
Nestled in one of Corio's quietest courts you'll find a true family home ready for you and your family. With 2 generous living zones the main space consists of a solid timber kitchen with loads of bench and cupboard space, dining area and family area where there is flow to the outside entertainment area. The 2nd zone is a large lounge ideal for kids or even a theatre room. With reasonably proportioned bedrooms including built-in-robes and walk-in-robe and en suite to the master bedroom. Well presented with fresh paint and offering a great design for any sized family, where you can move straight in. Outside features a sizable yard with the covered entertainment area north facing and flows from the double drive through garage. In an established court only a short stroll to bus stops, schools and Corio Central Shopping Centre (with everything you need) just over a kilometre away. In a couple of turns you could be on the Ring Road heading to the Surf Coast or Melbourne. An inspection won't disappoint.
Terms: 10% Deposit, 30 Day Settlement
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 14 Fieldman Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Solid Investment Opportunity
If you’re looking for a solid investment opportunity in the growth corridor of Geelong, then simply look no further. This solidly built late 70's home presents comfortable living on an expansive allotment of approx. 565m2.
Surrounded by all your major amenities including the Corio Village Shopping Centre, public transport, schools and ring-road access, there arguably isn’t a more resourceful location in Geelong.
Currently leased to December 2019 with exceptional tenants, the property comprises:
• 3 spacious bedrooms
• Large living area with gas wall heating
• Updated kitchen with ample bench space
• Double garage
• Generous off-street parking
• Good sized rear yard
• Expansive 565m2 approx. allotment
Call now to inspect.

Description:
Family friendly with a real back yard
Whether you are a first home buyer or investor, this home is guaranteed to please. Set on a 543.9m2 (approx.) it's a stone's throw from Corio Village Shopping Centre, only minutes from Schools, Shops & Public Transport, an hour's drive from Melbourne CBD, and a 15 minute drive from Geelong City Centre.
Apon entry you will be greeted by the separate lounge room which leads through to the dining and updated kitchen area which includes freestanding 600mm freestanding oven/cooktop. Featuring 3 good sized bedrooms (master with WIR and ensuite) and remaining bedrooms include BIR's serviced by the family bathroom which includes shower, vanity, bath and separate toilet.
Other features of the home include; new carpet and flooring, split system for heating and cooling, storage shed & kept in a well maintained condition.
With a possible rental return of $310 per week being conservative, this home would be a fantastic add to your investment portfolio.

Description:
Ideal Investment or First Home - 531sqm
This well presented, North facing family home, is located in a great part of Corio offering real value for the first home buyer or investor.
The home features 3 good sized bedrooms with built in robes and a large, sunlit, open plan living/dining area, with high raked ceiling and split system. The adjoining kitchen features plenty of storage and bench space. Outside is a 1.5 car colorbond garage and secure backyard with garden shed and plenty of grassed area for the kids to play.
Close to schools, shops and transport this property won't last long - call today!

Description:
"A Beauty in Rose Park Estate!"
This beautiful 3 bedroom home is set in the popular Rose Park Estate and tucked away in a quiet court. Positioned on a huge allotment of 700sqm (approx) and within easy access to schools, shops, public transport and the Geelong Ring road. Perfect for first home buyers, growing families or investors this property offers spacious living and great outdoor space. The master suite features a WIR and an ensuite with double vanity & large shower. There are 2 great sized living zones and a massive decked pergola for all year round entertaining. Completing the package is a large backyard and rear access for boat or caravan storage.
- 3 Bedrooms, main with WIR & ensuite
- 2 Living zones
- Kitchen with gas cooktop & d/washer
- Gas ducted heating, ceiling fans & rev/cyle a/c
- Double garage with internal access
- Enormous enclosed entertainment area
- Side access & garden shed
- Large grassed backyard
- Estimated rental return is $380-$400 per week
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Family friendly.
Presenting a wonderful opportunity to secure this much-loved, brick veneer family home which is set on a generous allotment of 559m2 (approx.). You can embrace the opportunity of creating something really special - perfect for investors searching for a set and rental home with tenants ready to occupy long term. The main house offers a generous and inviting lounge/dining area upon entrance which precedes the updated kitchen with breakfast bar. Two bedrooms in total are situated close by the neat bathroom and separate laundry that provides access to the rear yard. A further third bedroom can be found in the self-contained bungalow complete with ensuite and split system air conditioning surrounded by the lovely established garden. Secure off street parking is available in the tandem carport with roller door that leads through to the SLUG with an additional storage area attached. Additional features include heating, multiple split system air conditioners and solar panels. Centrally located in the heart of Corio the home is within walking distance to public transport, Goldsworthy reserve & Northern Bay College - Goldsworthy Road Campus. Being only a few minutes' drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, Geelong Ring Road & Princes Highway means easy access to most major amenities.

Description:
1 Bed Wonder
Unlike anything else you have inspected this 1 bedroom unit offers brightness and space usually associated with larger townhouses. Perfect for a first timer, investor or someone looking to downsize the land while still having reasonable living space. Feeling near new the kitchen is well appointed and practical with stainless steel appliances and loads of cupboard and bench space, the bathroom is stylish and the bedroom is generous. The flow from the kitchen, dining to lounge and then to the north facing courtyard is perfect for quality self-time or with guests. With extra storage space, an rc ac, car spot and extra yard space to do with what you choose, best of all is the absolute convenience of the location. With the areas largest shopping centre, Corio Central a stones throw, bus stops and easy highway access to head into Geelong or head to Melbourne. Privacy, security and modern living all come together in this stylish and spacious 1 bedroom home.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
A truly enticing prospect.
A classic brick veneer facade and a prized central Corio locale ensure this well presented home has all the ingredients necessary to create something special. Brimming with options to reside renovate or develop (STCA), this delightful home offers a relaxing and warm atmosphere just steps from parklands and schools. This highly appealing and charming home sits on a large 648m2 (approx.) parcel of land, ideal for first home buyers and investors who are looking for a low maintenance property. Comprising of light filled living and generous proportions the home offers a combined lounge and dining area that precedes the fully equipped kitchen complete with 900mm oven, dishwasher and breakfast bar which overlooks a second lounge area. The three spacious bedrooms lie close by the central bathroom and all come complete with BIR's. Moving outside enjoy relaxing and entertaining in the undercover alfresco overlooking the extensive grassed rear yard. Ample parking is available via the wide side drive and carport with drive-through access to the backyard. Within easy reach of Corio shopping centre, public transport and the Geelong Ring Road this lovely home is positioned perfectly for an easy and convenient lifestyle.

Description:
The essence of family excellence.
Proudly presenting a unique opportunity for purchasers to secure the ultimate family residence nestled in the heart of Cloverdale Estate on a luscious 1,303m2 (approx.) parcel of land. The home itself has undergone one of the most breathtaking transformations. Illuminated by natural light and surrounded by garden aspects at every turn. The interiors have been executed to perfection with the attention to detail and quality of the finishes embracing a timeless modern aesthetic.
Ample off street parking is assured with a large circle drive-way providing access to a double carport that in turn leads to a secure extended double garage at the rear of the allotment. From the moment you enter this charming property you'll feel right at home. The ground floor comprises of 4 bedrooms in total while the master suite comes complete with WIR and ensuite. The further bedrooms are easily accessible to the central bathroom that features a corner spa bath. A generous formal lounge flows superbly into the spacious kitchen at the heart of the home which overlooks the 2nd living area with wood fire heating.
Moving to the 1st floor you'll find 2 further bedrooms both with BIR's adjacent a 2nd powder room as well as a large rumpus room and study. Outside lies a magnificent decked alfresco which provides seamless inside/outside entertaining. The home is surrounded by manicured gardens and provides an abundance of yard for the kids or pets to enjoy.
Enquire today to receive full details of all features the home possess, inspections will be available from the 2nd of April 2018.

Description:
Price, Position, Potential
Representing terrific value for money in today's market, this neat and tidy home is located in a growing suburb and would be perfect for any first home buyer, renovator or investor.
Featuring three great sized bedrooms, a large living area, formal dining space, updated kitchen, neat central bathroom and sunroom.
The kitchen has been updated and features stone bench tops, dishwasher and stainless-steel cooking appliances.
Outside there is plenty of space, a large yard, neat gardens and double garage, plus extra off-street parking all behind secure fencing.
Includes gas heating and evaporative cooling, plus separate laundry and separate 2nd toilet.
All of this is positioned on a generous 640m2 (approx) allotment!
Extremely well located within walking distance to Corio Village, and within close proximity to primary and secondary schools. This home will tick all the boxes in today's market.

Description:
A family Home with Promise & Potential
In Corio's most sought after neighbourhood the Cloverdale Estate comes a home that is loaded with features and still has room for you to add your brand. With an updated en suite and bathroom, good size lounge, rc ac and a kitchen meals area that flows to the covered entertainment area. Outside there is loads of space behind a carport and secure fencing, including a huge double garage which can be either be the ultimate Man Cave or the perfect shed for the priceless toys. Fresh and vibrant with schools, shops, transport and the Ring Road access points only moments away. You will be hard up to find better value in this coveted estate.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Kick Start Your Investment Portfolio
Located across the road to local milk bar, take-away food shop, schools and Play Park and with easy access to Melbourne Highway this neat brick veneer home is a great investment opportunity. Consisting of 3 bedrooms all with BIRs and ceiling fans, central bathroom and separate toilet with hand basin, main living space with SS A/C, kitchen and meals area. Outside is a large undercover area and SLU garage. Set on a 654m2 block behind a high fence and gates providing a secure backyard for pets and kids. Extras include ducted heating. Opportunities with everything at your fingertips like this don't come around often but you need to be quick.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Attention Investors and Developers
Set on a corner allotment in the Residential Growth Zone in the heart of Corio this property truly is a close-to-everything brick veneer home. The home offers 3 bedrooms,2 with built in robes all serviced by a central bathroom. Lounge room located at the front of the home comes with gas heating. Kitchen is original but very serviceable and has a gas uprights stove. Stepping outside you will find a neat and tidy garden with garage and additional carport, all locked securely behind high gates. The position of this property is perfect, being located within walking distance to everything, including shopping centre and only minutes away from schools, doctors, public transport and easy highway access. Don't miss this opportunity as this property must sell.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Live in or Invest - 584m2
This lovely 3 bedroom home in Corio is ready for you to move into! Perfect for first home buyers or investors alike. Upon entry, there is a lovely tiled loungeroom, leading through to the dining room and kitchen. The 3 carpeted bedrooms all have built in robes. At the end of the driveway, there is a remote roller door leading through to the backyard with a large concrete area for additional off street parking, with double garage and spacious backyard. This property has the potential as a development site (STCA). Current rental estimate $300 per week. This property won't last long at this price!
